All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
addItemToCart
Handles adding CartItem object to CartList.
CartItem
CartItem Class - used to create a item that will be stored in the cart.
CartList
CartList Class - used to hold items the user adds to their cart.
ContinueWithNoAccount
Used for customers that continue with no account.
CreateAccountCustomer
Handles creating customer object and inserting it into customers table.
CreateOrder
Handles creating order object and inserting it into orders table.
Customer
This class is a business class model for Customer
CustomerLogin
Handles searching customer with given ID and ensuring the entered password and password stored in the database match.
CustomerUpdate
Handles updating customer information in the database.
Employee
This a business class model for Employee
EmployeeCreateAccount
Handles creating employee object and inserting it into employees table.
EmployeeLogin
Handles searching for employee associated with entered ID and ensuring the entered password matched the password in the database.
EmployeeUpdate
Handles updating employee information in the database.
LogOutServlet
Handles logging out employees and customer by invalidating session.
OrderList
OrderList Class - used to hold a list of orders
Orders
Orders Class - this is the business class model for orders
OrderUpdate
Handles updating order from unfulfilled to fulfilled.
SearchProductsServlet
Handles Searching products and putting the filtered product into session
UnfulfilledOrders
Handles retrieving all unfulfilled orders from orders table and putting them into session.
